item.title: Welcome to Albos
item.description: Eentje Tweetje You can just write markdown here. But don’t forget there are lots of shortcodes to help you with writing and showing off code too. See the documentation for Infusion for full details. Drietje <body lang="nl"> </body> Tested using Firefox with JAWS Safari Safari iOS with Jaws Edge Here’s an example of a note shortcode for adding little “oh and also” notes to your patterns’ documentation.
